title: What new feature would you most like to see in league of legends?
body:
What would you most like to see added to league?
Be it a small quality of life edition, like being able to see the number of people who have accepted the match again (like in the old client), or a massive game changing new feature like a long CD summoner spell that instantly recalls you to base.

E.g. More bans, skin rental, in game champ swapping, etc etc.

What new feature do you think would benefit league in the long run? Or at least keep it interesting.
And why?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: The ability to blacklist players so you no longer queue with them. I should not have to dodge because people are garbage.
A balance team that's not perpetually drunk, and actually plays the game hehe xd
more than a 2base damage jax nerf hehe xd
I would like a smooth client, tired of it messing up all the time

A Working Client, and a bugless game.

On a serious note, the old spectator frame, less ARURF, more regular URF, TDM/DM gamemodes.

The old spectate frame was good, i learnt a lot of my skills from watching the high rankers without even knowing there was such thing as high ranking (bless season 3)

ARURF is self-explanitory, i'm sick of getting the same 4 champs, even though i own every single available champ, sometimes i want to play AP Shyv you know. I'm also sick of the one-sided nature of ARURF, i already put up with it enough in ARAM.

TDM/DM modes are more my style, i've never been one to enjoy the idea of teamwork, and objective taking i do it because thats how the game works, but it's not enjoyable, and i'm sure some people would agree with me on the idea of a TDM/DM mode.

(A League RPG and Anime/Movie would be nice)
Skin previews and a game mode that reverts the game back to Season 1 (graphics, damage, items, buffs etc.). Although I hear the latter isn't possible or at least very very hard :(
Lol is infinitely funnier with mates. So stuff like clash would make this game go to the next level. ;(
